org.apache.mahout.cf.taste.impl.model

Class BooleanItemPreferenceArray

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.mahout.cf.taste.impl.model.BooleanItemPreferenceArray
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Cloneable, Iterable<Preference>, PreferenceArray

    public final class BooleanItemPreferenceArray
extends Object
implements PreferenceArray

    Like BooleanUserPreferenceArray but stores preferences for one item (all item IDs the same) rather than one user.

    See Also:
    BooleanPreference, BooleanUserPreferenceArray, GenericItemPreferenceArray, Serialized Form
